cuts.image_prompt: extreme wide shot, [scene description], rule of thirds composition, [mood] mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: slow zoom in, environmental movement, 10 seconds, establishing mood, maintain first frame composition

cuts.image_prompt: medium shot, [character description], centered composition, calm mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: static camera with subtle drift, natural character movement, 8 seconds, calm atmosphere, keep character centered

cuts.image_prompt: medium shot, [interaction description], over shoulder composition, conversational mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: static camera, natural gestures, 7 seconds, conversational pacing, maintain character positions

cuts.image_prompt: wide shot, [action description], diagonal composition, energetic mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: smooth tracking shot, dynamic action, 8 seconds, high energy, follow action clearly

cuts.image_prompt: close-up shot, [tension description], centered composition, tense mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: slow zoom in on face, building tension, 7 seconds, dramatic atmosphere, maintain focus

cuts.image_prompt: medium shot, [resolution description], rule of thirds, determined mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: dolly forward, approaching resolution, 8 seconds, building hope, maintain composition

cuts.image_prompt: close-up shot, [climax description], centered composition, triumphant mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: static camera, emotional peak moment, 7 seconds, triumphant atmosphere, capture the moment

cuts.image_prompt: wide shot, [conclusion description], golden ratio composition, peaceful mood, [style], 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: slow pull back, revealing final context, 5 seconds, peaceful resolution, maintain balance

music_sections.suno_prompt: [Orchestral Intro] 80bpm, soft, hopeful, optimistic, piano, strings, soft percussion
[Pop Main] 120bpm, energetic, dynamic, vibrant, drums, bass, synth, guitar, driving rhythm
[Orchestral Finale] 100bpm, powerful, victorious, heroic, full orchestra, brass, drums, choir, building to climax
